hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT template.id, template.name, creator.name, updator.name, template.createTime, template.updateTime, template.url, template.localPath FROM Template template LEFT JOIN template.creator creator LEFT JOIN template.updator updator WHERE template.templateCategory.id = :templateCategoryId ORDER BY template.createTime DESC
